description: I was having issues after setting up a couple of audio apps hat involved one re-initialising the motherboard audio. I also have a nVidea card and hdmi audio to the monitor. After many sessions attempting to figure out the clashes, I installed Studio Controls, and had the issue under control almost right away. I'm a fan!
Helped me with one thing, but made my games all have a slowed, double image, poor processed sound and I tried numerous adjustments but none helped.

Right now, it won't open at all. I just can't rely on it to work properly. If it ever works without issue, I think it could be really handy, especially for recording. For now, Pulse seems to do fine for basic computer usage.
summary: Unreliable, but seems to have potential
